input.prompt: Check if this website loads properly and identify any obvious issues, errors, or suspicious content. Look for security indicators, SSL status, and overall functionality.

content.content:
Web search results for query: "tatasteel.co.in domain problems issues security 2025"

Links: [{"title":"Whois tatasteel.com","url":"https://www.whois.com/whois/tatasteel.com"},{"title":"Tata Steel Privacy Policy","url":"https://www.tatasteel.com/privacy-policy/"},{"title":"Tata Steel - Wikipedia","url":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tata_Steel"},{"title":"Windows Server 2025 Known Issues and Workarounds – July 23, 2025","url":"https://www.askvg.com/windows-server-2025-known-issues-and-workarounds/"},{"title":"Steel Supplier & Manufacturer in India | Tata Steel","url":"https://www.tatasteel.com/"},{"title":"Server 2025 Domain Controllers - Trust relationship issues on workstations after 30 days as \"pwdLastSet\" value unable to be updated - Microsoft Q&A","url":"https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windowserver/forum/all/server-2025-domain-controllers-trust-relationship/4ef17f8e-8677-4ecd-a675-e5df1f4b48cf"},{"title":"tatasteel.com","url":"https://tslhr.tatasteel.co.in/recruit/Default.aspx"},{"title":"Zero Day Initiative — The June 2025 Security Update Review","url":"https://www.thezdi.com/blog/2025/6/10/the-june-2025-security-update-review"},{"title":"Tata Steel Careers","url":"https://www.tatasteel.com/careers/work-with-us/tata-steel-india-careers/"},{"title":"Tata Steel | Company Profile & Details","url":"https://www.tatasteel.com/corporate/our-organisation/company-profile/"}]

Based on the search results, I found information related to Tata Steel's domain (tatasteel.co.in/tatasteel.com) and some security issues in 2025, though not specifically targeted at the tatasteel.co.in domain. Here's what I found:

## Tata Steel Domain Information

The tatasteel.com domain is registered and expires on 2025-05-08, updated on 2024-05-02. The company uses AWS name servers for their domain infrastructure.

## Security-Related Issues in 2025

While I didn't find specific security problems with the tatasteel.co.in domain itself, the search revealed some relevant security context for 2025:

### Windows Server 2025 Domain Issues
There are documented domain controller issues with Windows Server 2025 that could affect any organization using this infrastructure:

Domain controllers upgraded to Server 2025 have a bug where workstations are unable to update their "pwdLastSet" value, causing trust relationship issues with the domain after 30 days.

Some organizations experienced problems where Cisco radius servers could no longer successfully negotiate with 2025 domain controllers, with AD 2025 sending a default expiry time of year 2100 causing parsing errors.

### General Security Vulnerabilities in 2025
There was a Critical-rated Windows Netlogon vulnerability (CVE-2025-33070) that allows threat actors to execute code on domain controllers by sending specially crafted authentication requests.

## Tata Steel Website Status

Tata Steel's main website appears to be functioning normally, describing itself as "one of the leading steel manufacturing companies of India". However, their recruitment subdomain (tslhr.tatasteel.co.in) showed an issue where "We cannot provide a description for this page right now".

The search didn't reveal any specific security breaches, domain hijacking, or major technical issues specifically targeting the tatasteel.co.in domain in 2025. The issues found were more related to general Windows Server 2025 domain controller problems that could affect any organization using that infrastructure.

## Tata Steel Domain Information

content.text:
The domain tatasteel.co.in appears to have **connectivity issues** - it's timing out when trying to connect (ETIMEDOUT error on IP 59.164.70.152:443).

**Main problems identified:**
1. **Server unreachable** - Connection timeout suggests the server is down or blocking requests
2. **Potential infrastructure issues** - The domain may be experiencing hosting problems

**No major security breaches found** for this specific domain, though there are general Windows Server 2025 domain controller vulnerabilities that could affect any organization using that infrastructure.

The legitimate Tata Steel website uses tatasteel.com (not .co.in), which appears to be functioning normally.
